name: The Trailhead
text: The forest edge is marked by a rusted iron gate hanging off one hinge. A faded map stand stands nearby, its plexiglass cracked. To the south, the dirt road leads back to civilization. To the north, the path disappears into the thick woods.

gate.description: Rusted and jagged. It looks like it was forced open from the inside long ago.

interactions.use: The gate groans loudly as you brush against it, the sound echoes through the trees like a dying breath.

map.description: The map is almost entirely faded. Only a few words are legible: 'THE HEART' and 'DO NOT ENTER'.

passive_checks.success_text: There's a fresh smear of mud on the plexiglass, specifically over the words 'DO NOT ENTER'.

choices.text: [Logic (Easy)] Examine the map for clues about the layout.
